description: Create security rule policy on PanOS devices.

username.description: Username credentials to use for auth unless I(api_key) is set.

spyware.description: Name of the already defined spyware profile.

hip_profiles.description: I f   y o u   a r e   u s i n g   G l o b a l P r o t e c t   w i t h   h o s t   i n f o r m a t i o n   p r o f i l e   ( H I P )   e n a b l e d ,   y o u   c a n   a l s o   b a s e   t h e   p o l i c y   o n   i n f o r m a t i o n   c o l l e c t e d   b y   G l o b a l P r o t e c t .   F o r   e x a m p l e ,   t h e   u s e r   a c c e s s   l e v e l   c a n   b e   d e t e r m i n e d   H I P   t h a t   n o t i f i e s   t h e   f i r e w a l l   a b o u t   t h e   u s e r ' s   l o c a l   c o n f i g u r a t i o n .

file_blocking.description: Name of the already defined file_blocking profile.

tag.description: Administrative tags that can be added to the rule. Note, tags must be already defined.

log_start.description: Whether to log at session start.

source_user.description: Use users to enforce policy for individual users or a group of users.

url_filtering.description: Name of the already defined url_filtering profile.

group_profile.description: S e c u r i t y   p r o f i l e   g r o u p   t h a t   i s   a l r e a d y   d e f i n e d   i n   t h e   s y s t e m .   T h i s   p r o p e r t y   s u p e r s e d e s   a n t i v i r u s ,   v u l n e r a b i l i t y ,   s p y w a r e ,   u r l _ f i l t e r i n g ,   f i l e _ b l o c k i n g ,   d a t a _ f i l t e r i n g ,   a n d   w i l d f i r e _ a n a l y s i s   p r o p e r t i e s .

api_key.description: API key that can be used instead of I(username)/I(password) credentials.

wildfire_analysis.description: Name of the already defined wildfire_analysis profile.

devicegroup.description: D e v i c e   g r o u p s   a r e   u s e d   f o r   t h e   P a n o r a m a   i n t e r a c t i o n   w i t h   F i r e w a l l ( s ) .   T h e   g r o u p   m u s t   e x i s t s   o n   P a n o r a m a .   I f   d e v i c e   g r o u p   i s   n o t   d e f i n e   w e   a s s u m e   t h a t   w e   a r e   c o n t a c t i n g   F i r e w a l l .

data_filtering.description: Name of the already defined data_filtering profile.

antivirus.description: Name of the already defined antivirus profile.

password.description: Password credentials to use for auth unless I(api_key) is set.

ip_address.description: IP address (or hostname) of PAN-OS device being configured.

rule_type.description: Type of security rule (version 6.1 of PanOS and above).

vulnerability.description: Name of the already defined vulnerability profile.

action.description: Action to apply once rules maches.

log_end.description: Whether to log at session end.
